ai-data-platform
****************


Description
===========

Use the AiDataPlatform Control Plane CLI to manage Data Lakes.


Available Commands
==================

* ai-data-platform

  * change-compartment

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * update

* ai-data-platform-collection

  * list-ai-data-platforms

* work-request

  * cancel

  * get

  * list

* work-request-error

  * list

* work-request-log-entry

  * list-work-request-logs
